Version differences[edit]

The Complete Edition includes all five episodes.

Essential improvements[edit]

Skip intro videos[edit]

Replace LogosInicio.mp4 with dummy mp4 file[2]
  1. Go to <path-to-game>\SongOfHorror\Content\Movies\.
  2. Delete or rename the existing file LogosInicio.mp4.
  3. Download the dummy file LogosInicio.mp4 from here.
  4. Place the downloaded file in <path-to-game>\SongOfHorror\Content\Movies\.

System Location

Steam Play (Linux) <Steam-folder>/steamapps/compatdata/1096570/pfx/[Note 1]

Video[edit]

Video settings.

Graphics feature State Notes
Widescreen resolution
16:9 anamorphic.[3]
Multi-monitor
16:9 anamorphic.[4]
Ultra-widescreen
16:9 anamorphic.[5][6]
4K Ultra HD
Field of view (FOV)
Windowed
Borderless fullscreen windowed
Used in place of exclusive fullscreen.
Anisotropic filtering (AF)
Scales with Effects quality.[7]
Anti-aliasing (AA)
TAA. See Anti-aliasing (AA) for more options.
Vertical sync (Vsync)
60 FPS
120+ FPS
Frame rate is capped at 62 FPS when Vsync is disabled.[8] See High frame rate.
High dynamic range display (HDR)
The game engine may allow for manual configuration of the game via its variables. See the Unreal Engine 4 page for more details.

Anti-aliasing (AA)[edit]

Change AA type through the config file[9]
  1. Go to the configuration file(s) location.
  2. Open Engine.ini in a text editor.
  3. Add the following lines:
[SystemSettings]
r.DefaultFeature.AntiAliasing=1
The above sets the AA type to FXAA. Change the 1 to 0 to disable AA.
Enable TAA sharpening through the config file[9]
This makes the game appear less blurry when anti-aliasing is on.
  1. Go to the configuration file(s) location.
  2. Open Engine.ini in a text editor.
  3. Add the following lines:
[SystemSettings]
r.TemporalAACurrentFrameWeight=0.2
r.Tonemapper.Sharpen=1

High frame rate[edit]

Modify user settings file[10]
  1. Go to the configuration file(s) location.
  2. Open GameUserSettings.ini in a text editor.
  3. Locate FrameRateLimit=0.000000 and set the value to the desired FPS cap.

Vignette[edit]

Disable vignette through the config file[11]
  1. Go to the configuration file(s) location.
  2. Open Engine.ini in a text editor.
  3. Add the following lines:
[SystemSettings]
r.Tonemapper.GrainQuantization=0
r.Tonemapper.Quality=0

Issues fixed[edit]

Crash on startup (AMD GPUs)[edit]

Update AMD graphics drivers[13]

Selected resolution does not persist[edit]

Enable the following compatibility setting for the SongOfHorror.exe file:[14]
  • Disable display scaling on high DPI settings

System requirements[edit]

Windows
Minimum Recommended
Operating system (OS) 7, 8 10
Processor (CPU) 2.6 GHz 3.0 GHz
System memory (RAM) 8 GB 12 GB
Hard disk drive (HDD) 16 GB
Video card (GPU) Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
AMD Radeon HD 7950
DirectX 11 compatible 		Nvidia GeForce GTX 980
AMD Radeon RX 580
A 64-bit operating system is required.

Notes

  1. 1.0 1.1 File/folder structure within this directory reflects the path(s) listed for Windows and/or Steam game data (use Wine regedit to access Windows registry paths). Games with Steam Cloud support may store data in ~/.steam/steam/userdata/<user-id>/1096570/ in addition to or instead of this directory. The app ID (1096570) may differ in some cases. Treat backslashes as forward slashes. See the glossary page for details.
